the story

A new way exploring the hidden places on your way through the city.

our app

business plan

financial breakdown

 

the pay per use revenue stream will ensure profits after the 33rd sale in one day. with 1500 estimated monthly sales our profit margin will be at 30%

dataset

the power of artificial intelligence to make suggestions to discover your city based on the places people loved

great places are hidden in heterogeneous data and we have algorithms to find these new valuable experiences for people

algorithm

simply provide your own constraints and we'll provide you unseen recommendations for your tailor made journey.

We compute data from several sources (Flickr, Dianping, and more) using machine learning to make the most enjoyable journey for you

 

about us

we are an interdisciplinary team of six young professionals working on a new way of exploring your city.
